definition: to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: When you stop SPINNING, it's always good to ease into a couple strokes of regular backstroke.
sentences.chinese: 转臂游结束后，最好放轻松游几下正常的仰泳。

sentences.english: For backstroke, good rotation is just as important.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，在仰泳中转髋也是同等重要。

sentences.english: In 2005, the backstroke of the west subtitler began a cross cultural conversation.
sentences.chinese: 2005年，西部人谁使字幕开始了跨文化对话仰泳。

sentences.english: A - Every time I watch a backstroke swimming race I worry the athletes will hit their head on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 每次我看仰泳比赛我都担心泳手会把头撞到墙上。

sentences.english: Return to left, right, left right, then hold the physio ball with both hands for backstroke.
sentences.chinese: 回到左，右，左吧，然后把球和健身球为仰泳。

sentences.english: The young swimmer has set up a new record for the back stroke.
sentences.chinese: 那位年轻运动员创下了仰泳新纪录。

sentences.english: How do the backstroke swimmers see where they are going?
sentences.chinese: 仰泳的选手如何知道他们前进的方向呢？

sentences.english: Swim backstroke, focusing on keeping the hands above the shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 游仰泳，专注于保持手举在肩。

sentences.english: In fast, shallow water, swim on your back, feet first.
sentences.chinese: 在浅而急的水中，要用仰泳，先蹬腿。

sentences.english: Letting the hand hesitate on the water in backstroke is the same as slowing your baseball swing to hit the ball.
sentences.chinese: 仰泳中手在水面停顿，就好比棒球击球时减力。

sentences.english: Do you know how to do the backstroke .
The pool is too crowded to swim the back-stroke.
sentences.chinese: 这游泳池太挤了以致于无法游仰泳。

definition: to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
